__e: ... and gives in to the dark side to save him.
'Not that I was afraid of uncovering some dark side of my character. 'But I always feel, if something seems to be working, leave it alone.
You know the dark places, too. Don't act like you don't.
I keep thinking someone is gonna open a door... and let me out of this dark room.
Like when you're in a dark room... but you can still feel a hand in front of your face.
He shall hang them in the darkroom... and they shall never be seen again.
He's in a dark place where the shadows move, and it's not safe to stand with him anymore.

Then I think about how scared you must be, how you're in some dark place all alone.
I mean, you tell me -- who would you rather meet in a dark alley?
You ever chase a cat down an alley?
You wouldn't want to run into me in a dark alley.
They were alone in the big, dark forest, all alone.
Then shoot me, and you'll be all alone, in the middle of a dark forest, with no idea who you are, where you're going, or what you're going to do next.
